headline.main: Israel Upsets South Korea 2-1 in WBC Opener
headline.print_headline: Israel Upsets South Korea 2-1 in WBC Opener

lead_paragraph: Scott Burcham's run-scoring infield single in the 10th inning led Israel to a 2-1 upset win over South Korea on Monday in the World Baseball Classic opener.
snippet: Scott Burcham's run-scoring infield single in the 10th inning led Israel to a 2-1 upset win over South Korea on Monday in the World Baseball Classic opener....
